column20: Desc
A staff made from a sturdy piece of wood. It's light and easy to carry, so anyone can use it. I think it's cute.
There is a fruit at the end of this staff, so it smells good. Hmm, I don't want to hit anything with this...
A clunky staff made with hard wood. It's tough, but doesn't look cute at all. A staff shouldn't be made to hit foes with.
A cute staff with a flower growing at the end. It's tougher than it looks. The flower really hangs in there!
A staff said to belong to the fairy queen that lives deep in the forest. I wonder if it's okay for me to use it...
Bell's broom. It's needed for casting magic, but the broom itself is ordinary. Knowing Bell, it's not for sweeping.
A broom with a cute ribbon and doll. I always thought witches had plain brooms, so this one really surprised me.
Unlike a regular broom, there is a charm cast on it. I'm amazed at how witches can use this to fly.
Witches in the past wore black robes. This broom was made with that tradition in mind. Looks plain, but it's magic!
A grand broom said to belong to a witch that became friends with a forest spirit. It's full of the magic of the spirits.
A regular pickax used in mining. It becomes an awesome weapon when Regina uses it. Awesome for anyone, really.
A pickax with a twisted tip. It looks scary. Using the tip will surely... I'm getting chills just thinking about it.
A sturdy pickax made with many different metals. It shouldn't break easily, so it'll be great for mining. Not great for foes.
A big, tough pickax for big, tough people. It's even hard for men to carry it, but Regina swings it around like it's nothing.
A grand pickax made from a hard mineral. It's so heavy, I can barely drag it on the ground. But Regina... Well...
A big sword that Linca always carries around. It was crudely forged and sharpened. It's amazing she can use this...
A giant sword you could hide behind. I always think Linca looks really amazing when she protects Marion.
A large sword made of glass. You might be worried that it will shatter, but it's much sturdier than it looks.
A large white sword with mysterious power. Modeled off a sword that belonged to a famous warrior a long time ago.
A very sharp sword that's said to only be as heavy as an angel's feather. But it's still too heavy for me...
A knife as big as a sword that Juris carries. It's usually used to field dress animals.
A knife said to be the same as those used by a warrior tribe in the forest. The shape is probably for practicality.
A hunter's weapon that bleeds the target out. They say you have to bleed what you hunt to prevent it from rotting.
A very sharp knife that can instantly down animals. Animals that get cut don't even realize they're dead...
The tip is jagged, like a wolf's fang. It's very sharp and can shred flesh. This weapon cuts two times at once!
A ring made of something resembling glass that Keith wears. I'm not sure, but it must have some special power.
A pretty ring made of crystal. It would make a great wedding ring, I think. But it looks kind of expensive for me...
A pretty ring with a star-shaped jewel. There seems to be a reason why it's shaped this way. Basically, it's magic!
A ring with a rune stone said to have some kind of power. There are runes carved into it.
A mysterious ring with a rainbow-colored jewel. No one knows what it's made of. I asked Keith once and he got mad!
A ladle used to serve soup. Don't worry! I'll do my best to protect you now, Nio!
I told Nio to get a better weapon, but it can't be flat on the end. Maybe it does hurt when you get hit with this...
A kitchen tool used to stir mixes. People don't usually use these as weapons. I'm glad Nio is more independent now.
It looks like a small metal pipe, but this is Marion's weapon. I'm not sure how it works, but I guess it shots out a small metal bullet.
A mysterious weapon that has a lot of power, but is really small in size. The recoil after shooting it is so powerful, it makes it hard to hit.
A small weapon made for taking quick shots. Compared to the other ones, its trigger is very light, so it needs to be handled with care.
I don't know if it's because they're old, but the wear from the mashing of gears isn't good. I don't know if I can trust these gears too much...
These gears are oiled nicely and move smoothly. Gears need to be maintained regularly or they'll wear out very quickly.
I don't know what they're made of, but these gears emit a mysterious light. Hmm, I wonder why Ms. Odelia likes gears so much...
